name: 墨西哥捲餅
description: 主要是將肉、豆、碎奶酪等食品和各種醬放在墨西哥薄餅上，並把餅捲起來完全包緊。它與墨西哥夾餅類似，但夾餅只是用薄餅將裡面的食物包裹住一半，而並非全部。卷餅所用的餅通常比夾餅的餅要軟得多也大得多。

name: Pancake With Sliced Strawberry
description: 在紐西蘭等大英國協國家也稱其為Picklete；是一種以麵糊在烤盤或平底鍋上烹飪製成的薄扁狀餅。薄烤餅多為速發麵包，有的則使用酵母培育或發酵的麵糊。大部分的薄烤餅是以烤盤單面煎烤，接著翻面使另一面適度受熱。

name: 烤雞腿炒飯
description: 粒粒分明的炒飯

name: 優格沙拉
description: 西餐中的一道普遍菜式，通常是配菜或前菜，有時也會作為一道主菜。

name: 海鮮粄條
description: 粄條是流行於華南的客家美食。

name: Spencer Steak
description: The rib eye or ribeye is a beef steak from the rib section. The rib section of beef spans from ribs six through twelve.

name: Chocolate Cake on Top of White Ceramic Plate
description: Chocolate cake or chocolate gâteau is a cake flavored with melted chocolate, cocoa powder, or both.

name: 炒海鮮
description: 客家美食炒海鮮，混著多種不同的深海鮮蝦魚、魷魚混炒而成。

name: Grilled Meat
description: Grilling is a form of cooking that involves dry heat applied to the surface of food, commonly from ... In Japanese cities, yakitori carts, restaurants, or shops can be found.

name: Meat Burger With Coleslaw
description: A hamburger is a sandwich consisting of one or more cooked patties of ground meat, usually beef, placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.

name: 鮮蝦濃湯
description: 經典料理濃湯

name: Salad
description: A salad is a dish consisting of a mixture of small pieces of food, usually vegetables or fruit.

name: Cooked Ramen
description: Ramen (/ˈrɑːmən/) (拉麺, ラーメン, rāmen, IPA: [ɾaꜜːmeɴ]) is a Japanese dish with a translation of "pulled noodles".

name: 經濟套餐
description: 簡單的餐飲，快餐就是簡餐的一種

name: 漂浮咖啡
description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted coffee beans, the seeds of berries from certain Coffea species.

name: Pasta
description: Delicious pasta dishes from classic spaghetti Bolognese to easy salmon linguine.

name: Beef Steak
description: Beef steaks are usually grilled, pan fried, or broiled.

name: Fried fish
description: Fried fish refers to any fish or shellfish that has been prepared by frying.

name: 涼拌沙拉
description: 沙拉可被視為涼菜。 沙律經常與蔬菜、肉、海鮮或蛋與蛋黃醬混合食用。

name: Ice Cream
description: Ice cream (derived from earlier iced cream or cream ice) is a sweetened frozen food typically eaten as a snack or dessert.

name: 健康簡餐
description: 為了健康，快來吃健康簡餐。

name: 照燒豬肉
description: 美味好吃的照燒豬肉，愛吃照燒的朋友走過路過千萬不要錯過。

name: Cooked Noodles With Shrimps
description: All you have to do is boil up some pasta and saute your shrimp in a pool of garlic-butter-herb goodness. Once that’s ready, just toss in your pasta and some fresh greens.

name: Pasta Parmesan
description: Parmigiana, Italian: [parmiˈdʒaːna], also called parmigiana di melanzane or melanzane alla parmigiana, is an Italian dish made with a shallow or deep-fried sliced eggplant filling, layered with cheese and tomato sauce, then baked.

name: Bread
description: Bread With Toppings and Gray and Green Olives

name: 肉絲炒飯
description: 肉絲炒飯，是在炒鍋或煎鍋中炒熟的米飯，通常肉類等其他食材混合。

name: 凱薩沙拉
description: 凱撒·卡狄尼在1924年發明了凱撒沙拉。卡狄尼是個墨西哥蒂華納（Tijuana）的義式餐館老闆兼主廚，他住在聖迭戈，但為了避開禁酒令（Prohibition）而在蒂華納工作。關於沙拉發明的故事有許多種版本，最常見的說法是，在有次七月四日那天，餐廳耗盡了廚房內所有的東西，因此卡狄尼用他僅剩的食材，並以他的天賦異稟，製作出了凱撒沙拉。

name: 什錦鮮蝦
description: 將各種不同的食材混和鮮蝦一同料理

name: Salmon
description: Cooked Salmon With Vegetables

name: 大口吃漢堡
description: 在十九世紀的中期，許多德國人隨著移民的熱潮，湧入了美國，同時也把牛肉餅的作法帶了過去，而成了眾所皆知的食物。

name: Sliced Bread
description: Sliced Bread With Avocado

name: Pasta!
description: Pasta With Parmesan

name: 鮮魚壽司
description: 壽司（日語：寿司、鮓、鮨、寿し〔壽司〕／すし sushi）是一種日本料理，主要材料是用醋、糖、鹽調味過，以肥小而稍帶甜味的日本珍珠米所煮成的醋飯（日語：酢飯/すめし），降溫後加上魚肉、海鮮、蔬菜、雞蛋或其他肉類等作配料。醋飯原為一種保存食物的方法：以醋酸令食物的酸鹼值下降，抑制微生物生長，以減緩食物腐敗。

name: Close-up of Fresh Salad
description: Super Fresh Cucumber Salad is a cold, crunchy, juicy mix of flavorful vegetables topped with a simple red wine and oregano vinaigrette.

name: 刈包
description: 經典口味的刈包在臺灣同時也是「尾禡」（尾牙，或稱「尾迓」）宴席上經常出現的菜色之一。
